1.0.22.name: wordpress/ramadan-alert-bangladesh-timing
1.0.22.description: Shows a Calendar of Iftar and sehri Timing on Sidebar of your blog/site. At current it supports 'DHAKA', 'SYLHET', 'CHITTAGONG', 'RAJSHAHI', 'NILFAMARI', 'MOULOVI-BAZAR', 'DINAJPUR', 'CHAA-DANGA' timing. More districts are coming soon.
